src:
Dia dos Mortos entre a tradição religiosa e a pagã
Entre as milhares de imagens pelo mundo, destacam-se os cortejos no México e no Brasil, entre outros acontecimentos menos ‘macabros’ deste sábado

02 Nov 2019, 15:59



Fotos vários autores EPA/Reuters
text:
Day of the Dead between religious and pagan tradition
Among the thousands of images around the world, there are the processions in Mexico and Brazil, among other events less "macabre" this Saturday

02 Nov 2019, 15:59



Photos various authors EPA / Reuters
